Address.label: Address
Address.value: 307 NORTH DEFIANCE STREET, ARCHBOLD, Ohio, 43502, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Farmers & Merchants Bancorp Inc is a holding company for Farmers & Merchants Bank of Central California. It engages in general commercial banking business. Its activities include commercial, agricultural and residential mortgage as well as consumer and credit card lending activities. The interests received on lending to the commercial and retail market forms the basis of the bank's primary revenue.
